name: Bright Minds
longDescription: We specialize in helping students with Dyslexia succeed academically through structured programs.

name: Focus First
longDescription: Focus First supports children with ADHD through personalized coaching and behavioral strategies.

name: SkillSpark Center
shortDescription: Support for children on the autism spectrum.
longDescription: SkillSpark offers speech and occupational therapy tailored for kids with autism spectrum disorder.

name: The Learning Tree
longDescription: The Learning Tree focuses on improving language development and communication through personalized speech therapy.

name: MindBridge Center
location: 3rd Floor, Phoenix Towers, Hitech City, Hyderabad
longDescription: MindBridge offers therapy sessions to address behavioral issues and support mental well-being of children and teens.

name: Hope Harbor
longDescription: Hope Harbor provides diagnostic services for learning disabilities and works with schools and parents for support strategies.

name: Rise and Shine
longDescription: Rise and Shine trains schools and teachers to create inclusive classrooms for children with special learning needs.
